results.name: Distance of A260273(n) to next power of 2.
comment: This sequence, as well as A261712, is suggested by A261396 and A261416.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..20 of triangle, flattened
program: a261644_tabf = [1] : f (tail $ zip a261645_list a261644_list) where
f dxs = (map snd (dxs'' ++ [dx])) : f dxs' where
xref: Cf. A260273, A062383, A261645 (first differences), A261712 (reversed), A261646 (row lengths).
